RemediationStrings.Title: This machine has no active RealtimeProtection.
RemediationStrings.Description: To continue to use this device you have to activate RealtimeProtection

RemediationStrings.Title: The AntiMalware Service is not running.
RemediationStrings.Description: To continue to use this device you have to ensure the AM service is enabled

RemediationStrings.Title: Antispyware is not enabled.
RemediationStrings.Description: To continue to use this device you must enable antispyware protection

RemediationStrings.Title: Antivirus is not enabled.
RemediationStrings.Description: To continue to use this device you must enable antivirus protection
